document.full_text: with a chain of command so tightly-run it would make a military officer proud, the southern baptist teams have been the backbone of disaster relief from the south's tornadoes.
document.title: for some, helping with disaster relief is not just aid, it's a calling
lines_and_colors: with a chain of command so tightly-run it would make a military officer proud, the southern baptist teams have been the backbone of disaster relief from the south's tornadoes.
